Wondrous Item (requires attunement)
When you attune yourself to this nimbus worn by the Valkyrie Queen of the Celestial Legion, peek at one random Sacred Augury card held by the GM.
When you score a critical hit while wearing the iron nimbus, you may peek at one random Sacred Augury card held by the GM.
